Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 23 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Bola (+10 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Lance (+12 1d8+3 P [Crit +d8]; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+12 1d6+3 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Bastion Dedication: Has the Reactive Shield feature
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Swords): Attack Master (Simple Swords; Martial Swords)/Attack Expert (Advanced Swords)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Pick): Weapon Familiarity (Pick)
Destructive Block: Can use Shield Block to negate damage equal to double the shield's Hardness by doubling the amount of damage to the shield
Disarming Block: (F) Follows a successful Shield Block with a Disarm attempt
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Nimble Shield Hand: Can hold or Interact with an object using a hand holding a non-tower shield
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise A Shield to absorb damage from the triggering melee Strike
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Shield Salvation: Can have a shield retain 1 HP when using Shield Block would otherwise destroy it; the shield must be repaired before benefitting from Shield Salvation again
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 3 available vs. 5 allocated
Destructive Block Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 10 and bastion dedication feature (currently 1)
Nimble Shield Hand Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and bastion dedication feature (currently 1)
Shield Salvation Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12 and bastion dedication feature (currently 1)
